claimCall((bytes32,uint256,address,uint2.details: Claims funds from the EtherSwap contract and performs a single external call forwarding the claimed Ether

params.callData: The encoded function calldata for the call
params.callee: The contract address to call after claiming
params.claim: The claim parameters for the EtherSwap contract

claimCall((bytes32,uint256,address,uint2.details: Claims funds from the EtherSwap contract and performs a single external call, authorized via EIP-712 signature

params.callData: The encoded function calldata for the call
params.callee: The contract address to call after claiming
params.claim: The claim parameters for the EtherSwap contract
params.r: Second 32 bytes of the EIP-712 signature authorizing this call
params.s: First 32 bytes of the EIP-712 signature authorizing this call
params.v: Final byte of the EIP-712 signature authorizing this call

claimERC20Call((bytes32,uint256,address,.details: Claims tokens from the ERC20Swap contract and performs a single external call

params.callData: The encoded function calldata for the call
params.callee: The contract address to call after claiming
params.claim: The claim parameters for the ERC20Swap contract

claimERC20Call((bytes32,uint256,address,.details: Claims tokens from the ERC20Swap contract and performs a single external call, authorized via EIP-712 signature

params.callData: The encoded function calldata for the call
params.callee: The contract address to call after claiming
params.claim: The claim parameters for the ERC20Swap contract
params.r: Second 32 bytes of the EIP-712 signature authorizing this call
params.s: First 32 bytes of the EIP-712 signature authorizing this call
params.v: Final byte of the EIP-712 signature authorizing this call

claimERC20Execute((bytes32,uint256,addre.details: Claims tokens from the ERC20Swap contract, executes arbitrary calls, then sweeps remaining funds

params.calls: Array of arbitrary calls to execute after claiming
params.claim: The claim parameters for the ERC20Swap contract
params.minAmountOut: The amount to sweep to the claimer
params.token: The token address to sweep (address(0) for Ether)

claimERC20Execute((bytes32,uint256,addre.details: Claims tokens from the ERC20Swap contract, executes arbitrary calls, then sweeps remaining funds to a specified destination This version uses EIP-712 signature verification to allow the claimer to authorize someone else to execute the claim

params.calls: Array of arbitrary calls to execute after claiming
params.claim: The claim parameters for the ERC20Swap contract
params.destination: The address where the swept funds will be sent
params.minAmountOut: The amount to sweep to the destination
params.token: The token address to sweep (address(0) for Ether)

claimExecute((bytes32,uint256,address,ui.details: Claims funds from the swap contract, executes arbitrary calls, then sweeps remaining funds

params.calls: Array of arbitrary calls to execute after claiming
params.claim: The claim parameters for the EtherSwap contract
params.minAmountOut: The amount to sweep to the claimer
params.token: The token address to sweep (address(0) for Ether)

claimExecute((bytes32,uint256,address,ui.details: Claims funds from the swap contract, executes arbitrary calls, then sweeps remaining funds to a specified destination This version uses EIP-712 signature verification to allow the claimer to authorize someone else to execute the claim

params.calls: Array of arbitrary calls to execute after claiming
params.claim: The claim parameters for the EtherSwap contract
params.destination: The address where the swept funds will be sent
params.minAmountOut: The amount to sweep to the destination
params.token: The token address to sweep (address(0) for Ether)

constructor.details: Constructor sets the EtherSwap and ERC20Swap contract addresses

params.erc20SwapContract: The address of the ERC20Swap contract to interact with
params.permit2Contract: The address of the Permit2 contract to interact with
params.swapContract: The address of the EtherSwap contract to interact with

executeAndLock(bytes32,address,address,u.details: Executes arbitrary calls, then locks the remaining Ether balance in the swap contract

params.calls: Array of arbitrary calls to execute before locking
params.claimAddress: The address that can claim the locked Ether
params.preimageHash: The preimage hash for the swap
params.refundAddress: The address that can refund the locked Ether
params.timelock: The block height after which a refund becomes possible

executeAndLockERC20(bytes32,address,addr.details: Executes arbitrary calls, then locks the remaining token balance in the swap contract

params.calls: Array of arbitrary calls to execute before locking
params.claimAddress: The address that can claim the locked tokens
params.preimageHash: The preimage hash for the swap
params.refundAddress: The address that can refund the locked tokens
params.timelock: The block height after which a refund becomes possible
params.tokenAddress: The ERC20 token address to lock

executeAndLockERC20WithPermit2(bytes32,a.details: Executes arbitrary calls, transfers tokens via Permit2, then locks the remaining token balance

params.calls: Array of arbitrary calls to execute before locking
params.claimAddress: The address that can claim the locked tokens
params.permit: Permit2 transfer permit signed by the token owner
params.preimageHash: The preimage hash for the swap
params.refundAddress: The address that can refund the locked tokens
params.signature: Signature over the Permit2 transfer permit and witness data
params.timelock: The block height after which a refund becomes possible
params.tokenAddress: The ERC20 token address to lock

claimERC20Call((bytes32,uint256,address,.notice: This function does not sweep remaining funds to the claimer, so ensure that the callee consumes all tokens
This function does not sweep remaining funds to the claimer, so ensure that the callee consumes all tokens
